Appendix D  -  The CO124 population

Data concerning a population of 124 countries (the CO124 population) 
are given in the following table.  

The columns in the table are:
LABEL:		The countries are labelled from 1 to 124.
COUNTRY:	The abbrievations are those of the International 
                Olympic Committee (except for a few countries).
P83:	1983 population (in millions).
IMP:    1983 imports (millions of US  $).
EXP:	1983 exports (millions of US  $).
GNP:	1982 gross national product (tens of millions of US $). 
MEX:	1981 military expenditures (millions of  US  $).
P80:	1980 population (in millions).
CONT:	1 = Africa,  2 = America, North & Central  3 =  South  America, 
        4 = Asia (non-Soviet part),  5 = Europe (non-Soviet part),  
	6 = Oceania and 7 = USSR


======================================================================
LABEL	COUNTRY	P83	IMP	EXP	GNP	MEX	P80	CONT
======================================================================
 1	ALG	20.5	10395	11163	4535	675	18.7	1
 2	BEN	3.7	131	63	122	23	3.4	1
 3	BUR	6.6	288	57	135	41	6.1	1
 4	BRI	4.4	194	76	122	23	4.1	1
 5	CMR	9.1	1217	940	715	82	8.5	1
 6	CAF	2.4	127	109	76	12	2.3	1
 7	CHA	4.7	109	58	36	62	4.5	1
 8	CGO	1.6	807	977	234	68	1.5	1
